title: Ibuprofen
description: Pain reliever and fever reducer for mild to moderate pain.

title: Cetirizine
description: Antihistamine used to relieve allergy symptoms.

title: Amoxicillin
description: Antibiotic used to treat a variety of bacterial infections.

title: Lisinopril
description: Medication for managing high blood pressure.

title: Metformin
description: Commonly prescribed for type 2 diabetes control.

title: Aspirin
description: Blood thinner and pain reliever used to reduce heart attack risk.

title: Omeprazole
description: Proton pump inhibitor used to treat heartburn and acid reflux.

title: Simvastatin
description: Medication to help lower cholesterol and triglyceride levels.

title: Albuterol
description: Inhaler medication for quick relief of asthma symptoms.

title: Hydrochlorothiazide
description: Diuretic used to treat high blood pressure and fluid retention.

title: Acetaminophen
description: Pain reliever and fever reducer commonly used for mild pain.

title: Atorvastatin
description: Statin medication used to lower cholesterol and reduce heart disease risk.

title: Clopidogrel
description: Blood thinner used to prevent blood clots after a heart attack.

title: Furosemide
description: Diuretic used to treat fluid retention and swelling.

title: Levothyroxine
description: Thyroid hormone replacement used to treat hypothyroidism.

title: Gabapentin
description: Medication used to treat nerve pain and seizures.

title: Losartan
description: Medication for treating high blood pressure and protecting the kidneys.

title: Pantoprazole
description: Proton pump inhibitor used to treat stomach ulcers and acid reflux.

title: Tramadol
description: Pain reliever used for moderate to severe pain management.

title: Fluticasone Nasal Spray
description: Steroid nasal spray used to treat seasonal allergies.
